title: Introducing: Pretty Sister
content:
Side-projects are notoriously inconsistent.

Sure, talented musicians shouldn’t just be limited to one river of creative output, but there’s a fine line between self-indulgent and undeniably worthwhile. Thankfully in the case of Pretty Sister, the project of Brent Harris from Auckland four piece Cut Off Your Hands, this debut track is more than enough to justify recording under another moniker.

Having played Oceans several times in the past hour, I’m still raking my brain for who it reminds me of. There’s elements of The Pains Of Being Pure At Heart in the guitar lines, whilst the unashamed indie-pop tendencies are Lightning Seeds-esque in nature, making for a wonderful first outing. Stream Oceans below, and keep in touch with Pretty Sister via their Facebook.
